text: In the Name of Life () is a 1947 Soviet drama movie directed by Iosif Kheifits and Aleksandr Zarkhi.Во имя жизниБиография Александра ЗархиВо имя жизни (1946) It stars Viktor Khokhryakov, Mikhail Kuznetsov, and Oleg Zhakov. ==Actors== * Viktor Khokhryakov as Doctor Vladimir Petrov * Mikhail Kuznetsov as Doctor Aleksandr Kolesov * Oleg Zhakov as Doctor Aleksei Rozhdestvensky * Klavdiya Lepanova as Lena * Lyudmila Shabalina as Vera == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1947 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Iosif Kheifits Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Zarkhi Category:Soviet drama movies
title: In the Name of Life
